input.message: =string.concat("%%%%% ModelService:BuildDeployDesc %%%%% ProjectID : ", $flow.ProjectID, ", Name : ", $flow.Name, ", ServiceType : ", $flow.ServiceType, ", Image : ", $flow.Image, ", ModelDescriptor : ", coerce.toString($flow.ModelDescriptor), ", ScriptSystemEnv : ", coerce.toString($flow.ScriptSystemEnv))
